description: Group preparation and facilitation of tutorial discussions, involving analysis of renewable energy policy impacts using market and industry data. Requires active engagement and critical evaluation of policy effectiveness.

Individual written report analyzing energy policies and regulations, evaluating their effectiveness, efficiency, equity, and feasibility. Includes data collection, critical thinking, and recommendations for policy improvements.
2-hour individual written examination testing understanding of renewable energy policy concepts, market structures, and their application to policy analysis and reform proposals.
